natural solution: Notice that $30\cdot70 = 2100 = 21\cdot 100$. The square root is thus $\sqrt{21^2 \cdot 10^2}$, which simplifies to $\boxed{210}$.

fixes x :: real
assumes h0 : "x = sqrt (30 * 21 * 70)"
shows  "x = 210"
